game.description: Retrieve the legendary sword of light from the depths of the dark forest.
game.objective: Obtain the Sword of Light and bring it back to the village elder.
game.reward: +100 experience points, +50 gold coins, and a boost in reputation with the villagers.

tasks.description: Venture into the dark forest and navigate through the twisted paths until you reach the ancient ruins.
Explore the ancient ruins and find the entrance to the Sword of Light's resting place.
tasks.objective: Find the Entrance to the Resting Place

tasks.description: Face the dark guardian of the sword and defeat it in combat to claim the Sword of Light.

game.title: The Quest for the Sword of Light
